gob.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: an impolite word for someone’s mouth
gob.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Jean told him to shut his gob.
She’s always stuffing her gob with food.
gob.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a mass of something wet and sticky
gob.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: There’s a gob of gum on my chair.
gob.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to blow a small amount of liquid out of your mouth
